abstract: International House Hunting column; four-bedroom British Colonial with updates and improvements located near nature reserve in Gibraltar, British Overseas Territory on Iberian Peninsula, is listed for $4.62 million; information about market and tips for buying properties in Gibraltar highlighted.
snippet: Gibraltar’s housing market has remained strong over the last 14 years, except for the year of the 2008 global financial crisis, when prices flattened....
lead_paragraph: Gibraltar’s housing market has remained strong over the last 14 years, except for the year of the 2008 global financial crisis, when prices flattened.
